com.nuance.android.vocalizer

Class VocalizerVoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nuance.android.vocalizer.VocalizerVoice

  • public class VocalizerVoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps information about a voice that can be used by Vocalizer in order to synthesize text. The list of available voices can be retrieved by calling VocalizerEngine.getVoiceList()
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nuance Communications
